abstract: AIM Mobile Inspections, which evaluates used vehicles being turned in as their leases expire, has observed a 30-percent uptick in odometer manipulation over the last year.
snippet: AIM Mobile Inspections, which evaluates used vehicles being turned in as their leases expire, has observed a 30-percent uptick in odometer manipulation over the last year.
lead_paragraph: AIM Mobile Inspections, an evaluator of new and used vehicles, said that the incidence of odometer rollback for the purpose of misrepresenting the mileage of off-lease used vehicles had increased by 30 percent since the beginning of this year.

headline.main: With Off-Lease Cars, Firm Sees Increase in Odometer Tampering
